word_group.brief_definition: 社会化媒体, 社交媒体
数字媒体；数码媒体；数字媒介
混合效应；多种媒介演出
流媒体；流式媒体；串流媒体
新闻媒体；新闻传媒；新闻媒介
当地媒体；地方媒体；本地传媒
媒体覆盖；媒体报道；媒介覆盖率
电子媒体；电子宣传工具

bilingual.source: It's easy to with social media tools.
bilingual.target: 使用社交媒体工具很容易。

bilingual.source: English spread through trade and the media.
bilingual.target: 英语通过贸易和媒体传播。

bilingual.source: They can even share ideas on social media.
bilingual.target: 他们甚至可以在社交媒体上分享想法。

bilingual.source: Jill is concerned about having a good social media profile.
bilingual.target: 吉尔关心拥有一个好的社交媒体资料。

bilingual.source: People can also keep in touch through social media websites.
bilingual.target: 人们也可以通过社交媒体网站保持联系。

bilingual.source: With social media, there are more chances to share the fun online.
bilingual.target: 有了社交媒体，有更多机会在线分享乐趣。

bilingual.source: Online shopping websites and social media apps have made it much easier.
bilingual.target: 在线购物网站和社交媒体应用使其更容易。

bilingual.source: However, things get out of hand when the media gets hold of the story.
bilingual.target: 然而，当媒体掌握这个故事时，事情变得失控。

bilingual.source: There are also social media platforms to help the students work together on projects.
bilingual.target: 还有社交媒体平台帮助学生一起完成项目。

list.abstract: media（英 [ˈmiːdiə]，美 [ˈmiːdiə]），英语单词，名词，意思为媒体；媒介；途径。短语搭配有social media（社会化媒体，社交媒体）。例句为“The most popular social media site is Facebook.（最受欢迎的社交媒体网站是 Facebook。）”

yingyinNormal.en: They certainly know how to take advantage of media attention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们懂得如何利用媒体注意。

yingyinNormal.en: For four years I got abused by the public, by the media.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整整四年，我遭到公众和媒体的谩骂，某种意义上 。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: You can make the video available to the media. I have nothing to hide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以把录像传给媒体，我没有什么好隐瞒的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's harder to keep an active VP out of the press than in it, but it's possible if we give the media just enough to keep them from starving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想让媒体不去关注积极的副总统是比较难的。但我们可以让媒体刚好有些料可追，不至于什么都拿不到。

yingyinNormal.en: All of us, citizens, leaders, the media have a responsibility and a role to play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们所有的公民，领袖，媒体都有责任，并且需要扮演自己的角色。

yingyinNormal.en: Francis sends his love. He would visit himself, but with the media. No, I understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰西斯要我代好，他很想亲自来，但是媒体... 不，我懂。

yingyinNormal.en: Drac, I told the guys social media is the best way to promote the hotel. Right, Clifton?
yingyinNormal.zh: 德古，我跟大家说了社交媒体是宣传酒店的最好方法，是吗，克利夫顿？

yingyinNormal.en: They're media savvy, they're recruiting around the globe. They have the money and the manpower now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们善用媒体攻势，在全球范围内招募人手，他们现在资金和人手都很充裕。

yingyinNormal.en: My name is Major Will Cage. U.S. Army Media Relations. I wasn't at a bachelor party or a poker game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是威廉姆凯奇少校，美军媒体专员，我没打一整晚的牌，也没参加单身派对。

yingyinNormal.en: Now let's look at where we are in reality, recent headlines, in the media, include Foreign Policy magazine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那现在来看看，现实中我们的情况，媒体中最近的标题，包括外交政策杂志。

yingyinNormal.en: And check Erik's social media footprint. I don't want any surprises in court. I got it. Don't worry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，调查埃里克的社交媒体足迹，我不希望法庭上出现任何意外。明白，放心吧。

yingyinNormal.en: The president himself signed the emergency appropriation into law after facing immense pressure from both parties and the media.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总统因受来自国会两党和媒体的巨大压力签署了这项紧急拨款法案。

yingyinNormal.en: And what's worse, you're in a media death spiral. No matter what you say, you will never get a fair interpretation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 更糟的是，你陷入了媒体的死亡漩涡，无论你说什么，都得不到公正的解释。

yingyinNormal.en: In our political system and in the media, we often see the reflection of a country that is polarized, that is paralyzed and is self-interested.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们的政体与媒体中，我们会经常会见到一个极化的，麻痹而又自私的国家缩影。

yingyinNormal.en: For a moment, if we could just disregard the governments and what the media's saying, just for the sake of the argument with our own tools of critical thinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们可能暂时不考虑政府或者媒体说什么，我们将心比心，用我们自己的批判性思维。

yingyinNormal.en: Are they paying you for all this media stuff at least? It's news, Lorrie. No payment is necessary. Oh, I wish the bank felt the same way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们有给你报酬吗？至少上媒体这种应该有吧？新闻节目，洛丽，是没有报酬拿的。要是银行也这么想就好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Just a few months ago this year, a very well respected and well-known business executives in Silicon Valley, invited me to give a speech to his club on social media.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年，就在几个月前，硅谷一位很受尊敬的知名商业经理人邀请我到他的社交媒体俱乐部发表演讲。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: So, one year later after launching on, nearly every media outlet had proclaimed that my new venture with a flop, not just a flop, but the big bold flop, they call it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在推出一年之后，几乎所有的媒体都宣布我的新事业失败了，不仅是失败，用他们的话说是“一败涂地”。

yingyinNormal.en: From the moment she volunteered to lead it, to the way she handled the investigation. And really dealt with the media. Hey, wait, she did... Did you say volunteered?
yingyinNormal.zh: 从她自愿接手这个案子那一刻开始，案件的处理。等等。调查。以及应对媒体。喂，等等，她是...你说她是自愿接手？

yingyinNormal.en: Jesus. This is all over social media too. Everybody in the world has seen this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，已经在网络上传开，全世界的人都看到了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 媒介；途径；方法；手段；媒质；媒介物；传导体；溶剂；灵媒；巫师；招魂者；中等；中间；中庸；存储媒介

word_family.mean: n. 媒体；媒介；途径；媒质；媒介物；传导体；溶剂；灵媒；存储媒介；（medium的复数形式）；传媒；中间层；米堤亚

examination_example.sentence: Most Americans rely on social <highlight>media</highlight> to check daily headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数美国人依靠社交媒体查看每日头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, the choice to share news on social <highlight>media</highlight> may be the heart of the issue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，选择在社交媒体上分享新闻可能是问题的核心。

examination_example.sentence: About a third say the problem of fake news lies in "misinterpretation or exaggeration of actual news" via social <highlight>media</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约三分之一的人表示，假新闻的问题在于通过社交媒体“误解或夸大真实新闻”。

word_usage.usage: media是medium的复数形式，表示“媒介；手段”，注意谓语用复数形式。
media作“传媒”解时，常与the连用，为单数集合名词，谓语既可用单数，也可用复数形式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 媒介；途径；方法；手段；媒质；媒介物；传导体；溶剂；灵媒；巫师；招魂者；中等；中间；中庸；存储媒介
adj. 中值的；平均的；正中的；中间的；中位数的

word_family.mean: n. 媒体；媒介；途径；媒质；媒介物；传导体；溶剂；灵媒；存储媒介；（medium的复数形式）；传媒；中间层；米堤亚

examination_example.sentence: This unintended impact has to do with the portrayal of conflict in <highlight>media</highlight> and how preschool-age children comprehend that conflict.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种意想不到的影响与媒体对冲突的描述以及学龄前儿童对冲突的理解有关。

examination_example.sentence: Incorporating the use of social <highlight>media</highlight> to screen job candidates is not an uncommon practice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结合使用社交媒体来筛选求职者并非一种罕见的做法。

examination_example.sentence: A 2018 survey found that almost 70% of employers use social <highlight>media</highlight> to screen candidates before hiring them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2018年的一项调查发现，几乎70%的雇主在雇用候选人之前会使用社交媒体对他们进行筛选。

examination_example.sentence: There are often accusations about politician's and the <highlight>media</highlight>'s lack of curiosity to find out the truth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经常有人指责政治家和媒体缺乏发现真相的好奇心。

examination_example.sentence: Many more people with HSAM started to contact researchers due to the mass <highlight>media</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为大众媒体，更多的超忆症患者开始联系研究人员。

examination_example.sentence: Its beauty is frequently mentioned in American <highlight>media</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的美经常被美国媒体提及。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 学会使用社交媒体，因为这可以让他们更好地了解外部世界。

n. 数据；数据资料；论据；（datum的复数）

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is reported that around 2, 800 million people often use social <highlight>media</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，大约有28亿人经常使用社交媒体。

examination_example.sentence: "It's never too early to start learning <highlight>media</highlight> literacy, "
A person who has <highlight>media</highlight> literacy would realize that each story is about one side at this time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个有媒体素养的人会意识到，在这个时候，每个故事都是一面说辞。
